::Rampage::
Rampage recovers from the missiles in just enough time to deflect 
Epyon's sword. He returns the attack with a stab for Epyons spark 
from his thermo-sword.


On 9 Apr 2001, at 20:07, RoboRick007 wrote:

> ::Epyon::
> 
> He fliped over, landing on his feet. He was about to block any on coming
> attack, but missiles hit Rampage's shoulder. He took the opertunity,
> thrusting forward, attempting to put his saber in RamPage's spark.
>
